## Goal
Upgrade member profiles, follow system, custom flair, and notification preferences for a richer and more personalized community experience.

## Tasks
- [ ] Extend Prisma schema for member profiles, follows, and flair
- [ ] Implement backend logic for profile data, follow/unfollow, and notification preferences
- [ ] Build frontend UI for member profiles, follow system, and flair assignment
- [ ] Add notification settings and digest mode
- [ ] Integrate recent activity and badge display in profiles
- [ ] Write tests for member experience features and privacy controls

## Acceptance Criteria
- Member experience features work as described in [parent issue](./community-engagement-core.md)
- Profiles, follows, and flair are functional and secure
- Notification preferences and digest mode operate correctly
